[' Perform statistical analysis and develop analytical tools for clinical and laboratory research data. Statistical consulting in experiment design and data interpretation in technology development and biomarker discovery. Statistical support for design and development of quality control process for immunoassay Manipulate and process large multisource and/or multovariate data sets. Respond to and manage requests to ensure accurate, in-depth results/data are delivered in a timely manner. Author statistical analysis plans, protocols and reports for clinical and non-clinical evaluations. Review study reports for statistical content. Provide general informatics support for laboratory research, technology development and clinical studies.  Adhere to data and documentation standards and manage deliverables for area of responsibility. ', ' D. in Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering or a related field, or Masters degree with extensive directly applicable job experience. Ability to understand scientific questions and formulate statistical and data analysis methods. Ability to effectively visualize complex datasets. Familiar with statistical techniques for biomarker / diagnostic assay data Experience in developing databases and data-driven applications.  Familiarity with validation of immunoassays / ligand-binding assays and FDA data reporting requirements. Proficient verbal and written communication skills to clearly explain complex technical details. Strong proficiency with statistical and data visualization tools e.g. Prism, JMP, Minitab, Excel, SPSS Proficiency with R, MATLAB, Python, SQL, and/or Linux beneficial. Commitment to the successful achievement of team and organizational goals. job_title: Sr. Data Scientist, Member Services Analytics
job_text: ["Transform raw data into impactful analysis characterized by strong data governance/documentation, advanced techniques, and strong recommendationsPlay a foundational role in deciding how we can improve Etsy customer support by identifying and helping execute on opportunities for improving operational efficiency and Etsy’s support experience through analysis of team workflow, customer support (email, phone, chat) and transactional dataPartner with Member Operations management; clearly present analyses that shed light on the customer support experience, identify high-impact opportunities for improvement, and drive teams' decision-makingIdentify critical metrics to understand the performance of the ongoing processes and new initiatives, develop reporting dashboards to track progress, and ingrain these metrics into teams’ day-to-day decision-makingOccasionally lead support-focused experimentation tracks, help teams set strong hypotheses, and deliver robust analysis of experiment resultsContinually evaluate and refine your technical toolkit; teach what you learn to the team", '3-5 years experience as a data analyst/scientist or in a quantitative role in which you extracted meaning from big data sets with little engineering supportProficient in SQL and have familiarity with either R or Python. Bonus points for experience with additional scripting languages (Spark, PHP, Ruby, etc.)Experience with Looker, Tableau, or other data visualization software a plusPursue opportunities to advance your technical skill set and to apply new methods to impactful questionsCommunicate insights verbally, visually, and in writing and care deeply about the quality and integrity of your workCurious, independent, analytically-minded individual who enjoys thinking about and solving complex and nuanced problemsCommitted to reproducible work and have picked up tools to this end; ['Conduct analysis of large datasets, extracting substantial insights from user listening data that will drive content decision-making. job_title: Enterprise Data Scientist – Permanent Full Time Opportunity
job_text: ['Partner directly with business stakeholders from across the company to analyze problems and implement solutions.Work with data across the complete analytical life cycle to build hypothetical models containing key assumptions, create mock-ups, prototype approaches, and implement production solutions.Identify, search, and analyze patterns in data in order to find opportunities working alongside our Product Development, Process Management, or Engineering teams.Specialize in one or more areas of advanced research and continually stay informed on new research relevant to the business.\xa0Utilize exceptional communication skills to be able to articulate the benefits of a proposed solution to internal and external stakeholders.\xa0Create detailed documentation of developed solution approaches for others to re-create including documentation formats such as internal wiki articles, product design specifications, cast studies, industry whitepapers, patent documents, publications, etc.\xa0Utilize capabilities of querying and analyzing data using a holistic perspectiveExtract meaningful statistics and other data characteristics using time series forecasting as well as a variety of approaches including statistical analysis, analysis of variance and correlational designs, machine learning for supervised learning, mathematical optimization for systems of equations, simulation using sampling techniques.', 'Minimum of 2-3 years of industry experience in a related role and an advanced degree in a related field or a minimum of 4-5 years of industry experience in a related role and an undergraduate degree in a related field.Familiar with a variety of technologies including: Object oriented programming languages such as Python, Scala, Java, C++, JavaScript, etc., Scripting languages such as R, SAS, Spark, Relational languages such as SQL, RDF, SPARQL, and Data formats including XML, JSON, CSV, Graphs, etc.Have experience with Machine learning for supervised learning and applying time series forecasting.Experience within the marketing, advertising, media, or related industry a plus, not required.', 'Partner directly with business stakeholders from across the company to analyze problems and implement solutions.', 'Work with data across the complete analytical life cycle to build hypothetical models containing key assumptions, create mock-ups, prototype approaches, and implement production solutions.', 'Identify, search, and analyze patterns in data in order to find opportunities working alongside our Product Development, Process Management, or Engineering teams.', 'Specialize in one or more areas of advanced research and continually stay informed on new research relevant to the business.\xa0', 'Utilize exceptional communication skills to be able to articulate the benefits of a proposed solution to internal and external stakeholders.\xa0', 'Create detailed documentation of developed solution approaches for others to re-create including documentation formats such as internal wiki articles, product design specifications, cast studies, industry whitepapers, patent documents, publications, etc.\xa0', 'Utilize capabilities of querying and analyzing data using a holistic perspective', 'Extract meaningful statistics and other data characteristics using time series forecasting as well as a variety of approaches including statistical analysis, analysis of variance and correlational designs, machine learning for supervised learning, mathematical optimization for systems of equations, simulation using sampling techniques.', 'Minimum of 2-3 years of industry experience in a related role and an advanced degree in a related field or a minimum of 4-5 years of industry experience in a related role and an undergraduate degree in a related field.', 'Familiar with a variety of technologies including: Object oriented programming languages such as Python, Scala, Java, C++, JavaScript, etc., Scripting languages such as R, SAS, Spark, Relational languages such as SQL, RDF, SPARQL, and Data formats including XML, JSON, CSV, Graphs, etc.', 'Have experience with Machine learning for supervised learning and applying time series forecasting.', 'Experience within the marketing, advertising, media, or related industry a plus, not required.', 'Enterprise Data Scientist (Permanent Full Time) ', 'Location – Hunt Valley, MD (fully remote currently, partial remote work flexible long term) ', 'Enterprise Data Scientist – Job Description ', 'Enterprise Data Scientist – Job Requirements\xa0', 'Enterprise Data Scientist (Permanent Full Time) ', 'Location – Hunt Valley, MD (fully remote currently, partial remote work flexible long term) ', '', 'Due to rapid company growth and recent acquisitions, his is a newly created Senior Enterprise Data Scientist opportunity within a publicly traded industry leading organization which was just ranked as one of the top employers to work in its market. Serving as an innovative and practical problem solver, the Senior Enterprise Data Scientist will join a growing team and will offer the unique ability to function as a thought leader and work directly across a variety of disciplines including: Data Science, User Experience Research, Data Visualization, Business Analysis, and Software Development. This is a full-time permanent opportunity offering a competitive compensation package including a base range of $135,000 to $150,000, excellent benefits, career mobility, and the ability to join a company culture dedicated to being an industry leader in data management innovation.\xa0', '', 'Enterprise Data Scientist – Job Description ', '', 'Enterprise Data Scientist – Job Requirements\xa0', 'Partner directly with business stakeholders from across the company to analyze problems and implement solutions.', 'Work with data across the complete analytical life cycle to build hypothetical models containing key assumptions, create mock-ups, prototype approaches, and implement production solutions.', 'Identify, search, and analyze patterns in data in order to find opportunities working alongside our Product Development, Process Management, or Engineering teams.', 'Specialize in one or more areas of advanced research and continually stay informed on new research relevant to the business.\xa0', 'Utilize exceptional communication skills to be able to articulate the benefits of a proposed solution to internal and external stakeholders.\xa0', 'Create detailed documentation of developed solution approaches for others to re-create including documentation formats such as internal wiki articles, product design specifications, cast studies, industry whitepapers, patent documents, publications, etc.\xa0', 'Utilize capabilities of querying and analyzing data using a holistic perspective', 'Extract meaningful statistics and other data characteristics using time series forecasting as well as a variety of approaches including statistical analysis, analysis of variance and correlational designs, machine learning for supervised learning, mathematical optimization for systems of equations, simulation using sampling techniques.', 'Minimum of 2-3 years of industry experience in a related role and an advanced degree in a related field or a minimum of 4-5 years of industry experience in a related role and an undergraduate degree in a related field.', 'Familiar with a variety of technologies including: Object oriented programming languages such as Python, Scala, Java, C++, JavaScript, etc., Scripting languages such as R, SAS, Spark, Relational languages such as SQL, RDF, SPARQL, and Data formats including XML, JSON, CSV, Graphs, etc.', 'Have experience with Machine learning for supervised learning and applying time series forecasting.', 'Experience within the marketing, advertising, media, or related industry a plus, not required.']

[' Build and maintain a connected ecosystem of dashboards and reports across multiple different platforms (Tableau, Redash, Arcgis)  Manage projects from inception to completion: requirements gathering, wireframing, KPI definition and refinement, build, QA and delivery  Work across all facets of the business with key stakeholders to transform requirements into actionable dashboards  Partner with the Data League to ensure reporting tables address the needs of the business  Provide ‘self service’ reporting solutions for managers across the organization to effectively manage their business  Maintain a ‘Source of Truth’ for company wide metrics ', ' 4+ years of experience in a data/BI role  Proficiency in Tableau and SQL, (ARCgis or other mapping tool experience a plus!)  Proven track record of successful dashboard development and adoption by business users  Strong familiarity with data warehouse environments (e.g., AWS and Presto)  Ability to balance speed and accuracy - we work quickly but smartly  Nimble mindset - our business is growing and evolving quickly, you’ll need to too! ', '  Flexible PTO.  Grubhub employees are provided a generous amount of time to recharge their batteries.   Health and Wellness.  We provide programs that support your overall well-being such as generous medical benefits, employee network groups, company-wide fitness challenges, and a comfortable and casual workplace! We also support our parents by offering 8 weeks of paid parent bonding time, a 4-week returnship program, and 6-8 weeks paid medical leave.   Learning and Career Growth.  Your personal and professional development is a priority at Grubhub. From day one, we empower you to lead and be an active participant in your career growth. We provide continuous learning opportunities, training, and coaching and mentorship programs.   MealPerks.  Who’s ready for some lunch? We provide our employees with a weekly Grubhub credit to enjoy and support local restaurants. We also offer company-wide meals several times a year to bring our Grubhub family together.   Fun.  Every Grubhub office has an employee-led Culture Crew that connects people through fun, meaningful events and initiatives. Some of our popular past events include: Wing-eating contests, Grubtoberfest, 5k Runs, Bring Your Child to Work Day, regular happy hours, and more!   Social Impact.  We believe in the importance of serving the communities that support our business. In addition, employees are given paid time off each year to support the causes that are important to them. ['Balance Staffing is hiring a Data Analyst for our client in Cupertino, CA.', '', 'Job Title: Data Analyst II', '', 'Duties: Strong data and analytic skills, knowledge of excel, numbers and data modeling. Knowledge of or experience working on subscription businesses a plus. Reporting and presentation skills a must. Looking for a person who has a passion for data and numbers. The successful candidate will turn data into information and insights that will help support business decisions. We produce investment insights by using machine learning techniques, fundamental company analysis, macro and sell-side research, and quantitative methodologies.\xa0Role:\xa0As a Data Scientist, you will support an idea generator testing investment theses using alternative data and building models to execute on the results of that research.\xa0Responsibilities: ', 'Test research hypotheses and assumptions of researchersPull data from disparate sources Design and validate models that transform data into actionable insights ', 'Pull data from disparate sources ', 'Design and validate models that transform data into actionable insights ', 'Identify and deploy statistical, machine learning, and deep learning methods that strike the right balance between predictive power and robustness ', 'Write efficient, modular, and dependable code, packages, libraries, and scripts ', 'Iterate quickly to test the additive impact of new data and research findings on alpha generation ', 'Document all work extensively ', 'Stay abreast of new research ', 'Ph.D. (preferred) or M.S. in a technical field with an applied or experimental component ', '3+ years of experience in a relevant field researching real-world data problems (though not necessarily in finance) ', 'Extensive experience developing algorithms and production-grade code ', 'Strong programming skills in Python and SQL/NoSQL ', 'Experience with cloud infrastructures ', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills and a proven ability to collaborate with others']

['Must-haves ', '-3 years experience in data analysis ', ' -Proficient with Power BI, able to create dashboards from scratch ', ' -Highly proficient with data analysis and data quality in Excel, able to perform Vlookups, Macros, and Pivot tables ', ' -Comfortable with SQL ', ' -1 year of scripting skills in Python or Shell ', '', 'Plusses ', '-Previous experience working with marketing and/or financial data ', '', 'Day-to-Day ', 'An employer in Carlsbad, CA is looking for a Data Analyst to join their team. This individual will be part of the Data Science group, supporting Data Science initiatives for various business divisions of the organization. The Data Analyst will be joining a team of 7 and will be directly supporting tasks for a senior analyst. This individual will primarily be focused on PowerBI needs including: updates, data refreshes, creating new dashboards, new enhancements, and ensuring data quality. The data analyst should be highly proficient with data connections to PowerBI and will be responsible for identifying any broken data sources. This individual will also be pulling data from SQL, verifying it in Excel when necessary, and troubleshooting existing scripts for automation.\xa0']

['Research, define, and develop new methods for analyzing and measuring quality of product features and product releases. Design methodologies to model components of distributed systems. Design and engineer experiments on end to end scenarios. Analyze data and study the system to provide meaningful insights on the product quality. Build predictive models and conduct experiments to gain insights into quality, health of the product and customer usage. Cross-collaborate with engineers on building statistical models, applying machine learning techniques for targeted solutions and effectively communicating the analysis and findings through interactive visualizations, documents, and presentations. Strong interpersonal, oral, and written communication and presentation skills, ability to communicate complex findings in a simple manner. Enjoy discovering and solving problems; proactively seeking clarification of requirements and direction; being a self-starter who takes responsibility when required. [' This role will combine both individual contributor and leadership components across the Enterprise. Provides mentoring and direction for various product owners as specified by Chief Growth & Product Officer. Always maintains CUSTOMER focus, being available for consultative engagements with internal and external customers, as well as client demos as directed by Chief Growth & Product Officer. Responsible for conceptualizing an overall design, development, and implementation of data visualization dashboards. Responsible for in-depth reporting of data analytics across the product development sectors. Leads Strategic Investment Program (SIP) Initiative up to and including rebuilding of templates as well as collaboration with Product Managers and Product Marketing personnel to bring each SIP gate to fruition. Directs and develops multiple projects simultaneously. Ensures and initiates regular communication interface with Engineering and Product teams. Uses data science to increase revenues, improve care management, optimize business processes and improve member experience Designs and constructs data/analytics platforms to support the data visualization for dashboards and digital solutions across the Enterprise. Designs and brings to life tools that support value-base care models. Relentlessly innovates to bring about a transformative healthcare experience for patients. Influences population health strategy by championing innovative ideas through product and data analytics. Constructs blueprints for business intelligence platforms that support advanced analytics and data optimization. Leads data governance and design for the Aerial portfolio to execute on maximum value for the clients we serve. Ensures that projects provide measurable value to our business stakeholders including embedded value metrics in each individual Aerial application. Spearheads the establishment of robust dashboards by incorporating value metrics into each of the Aerial applications. Effectively communicates across all platforms and departments, ensuring that input is garnered from key business stakeholders to ensure that commitments are realistic and timely.', ' MA required; Ph.D preferred Minimum 10-15 years of experience in similar role. Minimum of 10-15 years of experience in managing departments across the enterprise. Growth mindset, sociopolitical savvy, emotional intelligence, efficiency in total work systems, and ability to deal with paradox. Good understanding of Healthcare Payer and Provider data across multiple functional areas such as members, claims, providers and other pertinent clinical and non-clinical information Prior experience working with organizations performing care management, population health and healthcare data analytics Excellent interpersonal communication and conflict resolution skills. Ability to coach leaders. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.', ' Business transformation, innovation, balances stakeholders, nimble learning, values differences, global perspective, customer focus.', ' This role ['Join a team of diverse professionals at Farmers to acquire skills on the job and apply your learned knowledge to future roles at Farmers. Farmers Insurance also offers extensive training opportunities through the award winning University of Farmers named by Training magazine amongst top 10 corporate training units in the world.Want to learn more about our culture & opportunities? job_text: ['My client is a high growth financial technology vendor that sells reconciliation software into a variety of financial institutions. They also provide data collection and a managed services that to improve and auotmate processes for their clientele.', '', 'They are looking for a technical data analyst to join there Tampa based team. This role will involve general day to day interaction with clientele, along with some technical data manipulation and automation to improve their processes.\xa0', '', "The ideal candidate is someone with 2-4 years experience working within a financial institution's middle/back office in an operational role, someone who has a solid understanding and interest in financial instruments, along with some proficiency in SQL.", '', 'Although a junior role, this is an organisation with massive potential for growth and big plans for their next 3-5 years.', '', 'If this role is of further interest, please apply or Email me at james.campbell@harringtonstarr.com']

['Data Scientist, Oncology Bioinformatics ', 'Location: Boston, Massachusetts', 'Principal Duties and Responsibilities', 'Job Qualifications', 'Data Scientist, Oncology Bioinformatics ', 'Location: Boston, Massachusetts', ' ', ' Monte Rosa Therapeutics is a rapidly growing startup company headquartered in Boston, MA with additional laboratory facilities in Basel, Switzerland. We are seeking a highly motivated and talented individual with a strong computational and analytical background to join our Data Science team in Boston. The candidate will be a highly creative computational biologist/ data scientist with strong programming and data analysis background and an ambition to tackle high-impact complex computational biology problems involving large-scale biological and pharmacological datasets. The successful candidate will work closely with a world-class team of scientists to develop the next generation of protein degraders in a highly dynamic and collaborative environment. In this position, you will have the opportunity to push the boundaries of science and help to accelerate the discovery of new therapeutics for cancer and beyond.', '', ' Principal Duties and Responsibilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and maintain analytical and data visualization pipelines for next generation sequencing, proteomics, and pharmacological data ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and execute data analysis strategies to support research projects involving multimodal datasets', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Together with other team members, you will develop and advance the Monte Rosa in-silico target identification and virtual screening engine', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze public clinical and preclinical datasets (e.g. TCGA, GENIE, CCLE and DepMap) to prioritize drug targets and identify patient populations', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Support the in-vitro and in-vivo experimental design, data analysis and data visualization ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Present ideas and results to the Data Science team. Prepare written reports and presentations for internal and external use ', 'Job Qualifications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. in Computer Science, Physics, Statistics, Math, Engineering, or a related quantitative discipline', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong programming background; Proficiency in at least one modern programming language; Experience with a scientific programming environment, such as python, R, or Matlab', '', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with high throughput computing or cloud computing platforms', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with computational analysis, algorithm development, statistics, and machine learning', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Flexibility to accommodate to rapidly changing priorities and deadlines', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work in a team-based environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral and written communication skills ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Background in genetics or biology is a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of cancer genomics is a plus but is NOT required\xa0', '', '', 'Interested candidates should forward a resume and cover letter to careers-US@monterosatx.com', '', 'Monte Rosa Therapeutics rational approach in targeting disease-causing proteins for degradation will deliver pioneering therapies for cancer and other diseases. Delivering this new generation of treatments to the patients requires a conceptual change.\xa0Monte Rosa recognizes this urgent need and is missioned to develop innovative protein degraders as a solution. Combining deep knowledge, insight and leading-edge science, our integrated engine is built for that purpose.', '\xa0']

['Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi HealthDevelop and implement data models to guide business decisionsMapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. Documentation of a data source must describe the semantics of the data so that the occasional subtle differences in meaning are understood.Documenting interfaces and data movement by recording how mapped data is moved around the virtual enterprise. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations.Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved.Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Some views will use a database of extracted data and others will bring together data in near real time, considering data currency, availability, response times and data volumes. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation.Defining technical standards and guidelines. Assess and document when and how to use the architected producers and consumers, the technologies to be used for various purposes, and models of selected entities, objects and processes. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality.Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs).Leveraging existing [core] data assets.Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency.Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise.Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field.A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role.Must have AWS or Azure experience. (Snowflake, Databricks, S3 desirable)Must have ELT/ETL experience (Talend, MDM, other ETL/ELT tools)Must have coding experience (python, JAVA, R),\xa0Familiarity of system concepts and tools within an enterprise architecture framework.Knowledge of various modern data formats, tools, and methodologies. (Infomatics desirable)', 'Excellent organizational and analytical abilities.', 'Outstanding problem solver.', 'Good written and verbal communication skills.', 'WHO ARE WE?\xa0', 'WHICH LEADER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT?', 'WHY IS THIS ROLE CRITICAL?', 'WHAT IS A DAY IN THE LIFE?', 'OK, HOW ABOUT A FEW SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES?', 'Data Science Engineer requirements are:', '\ufeffNomi Health is offering a highly competitive compensation package with an attractive base salary as well as a significant equity stake into the company at an early stage.', 'WHO ARE WE?\xa0', '', 'Nomi Health is the modern payment system for employee healthcare. We sidestep the middlemen, and connect employers providers and families directly at scale to cut healthcare costs by 30% across America. We will do this by eliminating high cost “out of network” charges, making the process all digital with easy access to real data and understandable actions.\xa0', 'The company is in stealth mode right now and has raised over $10M in seed funding which will be used to hire and develop the product, technology and go-to-market team.\xa0', '', "Nomi Health is led by Mark Newman (Founder/CEO) , Josh Walker (Co-Founder, COO) and Boe Hartman (Co-Founder, CTO). Both Mark, Josh and Boe have a proven track record in the HR Tech, Health Tech, Health plans, Pharmacy and Financial Service industries. Mark, previously Founder/CEO of HireVue where he scaled the company from 0 to $40m ARR with a successful exit of over $500M. Josh, comes with 18+ years of experience in healthcare as COO at Imagine Health, Upwell and OptumInsight where he has first-hand experience in international and domestic healthcare markets leading and expanding business growth. Boe has served in multiple senior positions across global banking for over 25 years.\xa0Most recently, at Goldman Sachs as a Partner, where he led the firm’s launch of it’s digital consumer bank; Marcus By Goldman Sachs and the firm's entry into the consumer credit card market.", '', 'WHICH LEADER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT?', 'Chief Technology Officer', '', 'WHY IS THIS ROLE CRITICAL?', '', 'We are looking for a Data Science Engineer who can help pave the way for more work in the data field and start by analyzing our current needs and use data to generate value with Nomi Health’s end goal in mind. From this goal, you will design the architecture and the analytics pipelines while taking into account appropriate time frames, and costs.', '', 'Since we are early in our journey and we will be soon dealing with a lot of data, this person will set the stage for future work of data scientists and data engineers.\xa0', '', 'WHAT IS A DAY IN THE LIFE?', '', 'As a Data Science Engineer you will provide technical and domain subject knowledge to the company and future customers. You should be able to know how to examine new data systems requirements and implement migration models. You will also spend a good deal of time problem solving, analyzing architecture and assessing architect models, reviewing data migrations, selecting platforms and on-boarding of data management solutions that meet the technical and operational needs of the business.\xa0You must be hands-on with tools and code.', 'Requirements', '', 'OK, HOW ABOUT A FEW SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES?', '', '', 'Data Science Engineer requirements are:', '', '', '\ufeffNomi Health is offering a highly competitive compensation package with an attractive base salary as well as a significant equity stake into the company at an early stage.', '', 'Benefits', 'Health, Dental, Vision, 401k with match, Commuter benefits with Great Pay, plus Equity.', 'Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi Health', 'Develop and implement data models to guide business decisions', 'Mapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. Some views will use a database of extracted data and others will bring together data in near real time, considering data currency, availability, response times and data volumes. [' Strong data and analytic skills, knowledge of excel, numbers and data modeling. Knowledge of or experience working on subscription businesses a plus. Reporting and presentation skills a must. Looking for a person who has a passion for data and numbers. The successful candidate will turn data into information and insights that will help support business decisions. Work closely with the Data Anlytics team and cross functionally in marketing to produce monthly & quarterly data driven markeitng reports. Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports. Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality. Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets. Filter and "clean” data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems. Work with management to prioritize business and information needs. [' Supports multiple field programs in their development of community-based freshwater fisheries programs. Supports the development and deployment of freshwater conservation plans in key geographies. Adapts existing tools in the marine fisheries realm to use in freshwater fisheries context. Supports adaptive management through the development and implementation of monitoring and evaluation programs. Supports the global team in promoting the importance of fisheries protection and conservation in international fora. Increases understanding and uptake of freshwater community-based conservation approaches at the Conservancy through development of knowledge, tools, and trainings. May provide fieldwork and logistical support for research, project development, and monitoring. Travels up to 20% in both the US and internationally, once Covid-19 restrictions are lifted. May manage grants, contracts, or requests for proposal. May lead staff, interns, or volunteers on a project basis. Must work in variable weather conditions, at remote locations, in hazardous terrain and under physically demanding circumstances.', ' BA/BS degree and 5 years’ experience in conservation practice or equivalent combination of education and experience. Experience managing complex or multiple projects, including staffing, workloads and finances under deadlines. Experience developing and implementing training workshops. Experience in partnership development with non-profit partners, community groups and/or government agencies Experience negotiating.', ' Multi-lingual and multi-cultural or cross-cultural experience appreciated. MSc or PhD in freshwater fisheries science or management. Demonstrated experience influencing, developing, and implementing fisheries conservation plans. Communicating clearly via written, spoken, and graphical means in English and other relevant languages. Knowledge of methods and standards of biodiversity information systems and initiatives or related field. Supervisory experience, including motivating, leading, setting objectives and managing performance. Strong knowledge of common software applications. Attention to detail. Ability to meet deadlines.', 'Supports multiple field programs in their development of community-based freshwater fisheries programs.', 'Supports the development and deployment of freshwater [' Design, build, launch, and maintain databases, dashboards, and reports to help improve AV operations Utilize Looker, Google Cloud, and SQL to pull data and provide analytical insights to solve operational and business problems Monitor databases for data integrity and quickly resolve issues using an agile approach Set up tests and perform statistical analyses to determine the effectiveness of operational changes Partner with the Operational Analytics team to prepare reports for leadership to effectively communicate trends, patterns, and predictions Train cross functional stakeholders on how to leverage Cruise’s operational data to improve their workflows ', ' 3+ years of experience analyzing, manipulating, and visualizing large datasets Advanced proficiency in SQL Experience using Looker, Tableau, or similar Business Intelligence applications Ability to translate analyses into business recommendations Excellent written and verbal communication skills Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Statistics, Mathematics, or relevant field General knowledge of statistics Experience in automotive industry, operational environment, or similarly fast-paced technology environment Strong knowledge of Microsoft and Google Suite ', ' Proficiency in Python, C++, and/or other coding languages Master’s degree in a related field Advanced statistics knowledge Advanced Excel or Google Sheets modeling skills ', ' This position can also be based in our Phoenix or Seattle offices.  ', " Our benefits are here to support the whole you: Competitive salary and benefits  401(k) Cruise matching program  Medical / dental / vision, AD+D and Life Flexible vacation and company paid holidays Healthy meals and snacks provided Paid parental leave & family expansion stipend Monthly wellness stipend Commuter benefits   We’re Integrated Through our partnerships with General Motors and Honda, we are the only self-driving company with fully integrated manufacturing at scale.   We’re Funded GM, Honda, SoftBank, and T. Rowe Price have invested billions in Cruise. Their backing for our technology demonstrates their confidence in our progress, team, and vision and makes us one of the leading autonomous vehicle organizations in the industry. Our deep resources greatly accelerate our operating speed.   We’re Independent We have our own governance, board of directors, equity, and investors. Our independence allows us to not just work on the bleeding-edge of technology, but also define it.   We're Vested You won’t just own your work here, you’ll have the potential to own equity in Cruise, too. We are competing in a market that is projected to grow exponentially, which gives our company valuation room to grow.    ", ' Competitive salary and benefits  401(k) Cruise matching program  Medical / dental / vision, AD+D and Life Flexible vacation and company paid holidays Healthy meals and snacks provided Paid parental leave & family expansion stipend Monthly wellness stipend Commuter benefits ', ' Through our partnerships with General Motors and Honda, we are the only self-driving company with fully integrated manufacturing at scale. ', ' GM, Honda, SoftBank, and T. Rowe Price have invested billions in Cruise. ['Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasetsUse your machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problemsDesign, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters.Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization PlatformParticipate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects', 'Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasets', 'Use your machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problems', 'Design, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters.', 'Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization Platform', 'Participate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects', 'External Title:', 'Internal Title:', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'External Title: Data Scientist\xa0Internal Title: Decision Science, Scientist\xa0', 'As a Data Scientist in our Decision Sciences R&D organization, yyou will be responsible for researching and building machine learning, natural language processing, and recommender system applications to extend\xa0Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform. Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform analyzes anonymized data at Internet scale and evaluates more than one trillion advertising opportunities per month in real-time. You will work on real-world problems as part of our highly collaborative R&D team, and your solutions will directly and rapidly impact our business.\xa0This includes analyzing raw source data and derived data,\xa0researching and developing models, algorithms, and applications,\xa0building tools and analyses for new and existing products\xa0and presenting findings.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasets', 'Use your machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problems', 'Design, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters.', 'Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization Platform', 'Participate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects']

['Your duties will include: ', 'Qualifications:', 'Nice to have:', 'Phylum is a data science software company offering consulting and turnkey solutions on our proprietary platform, DataEngine. DataEngine provides advanced analytics and data aggregation tools to help companies identify market gaps, predict and uncover insights into consumer experience. \xa0\xa0', '', 'We’re seeking to grow a team of brilliant and diverse contributors with natural language processing (NLP) expertise to build systems that read proprietary and public text datasets, extract key information to be input as features for statistical models. This is a chance to get into a cutting edge company on the ground floor with opportunities for leadership level growth, equity and founding status. Lead Data Scientist – NLP role is a hands-on position where you will be empowered to be creative, ambitious and bold, to solve novel R&D problems that haven’t been solved yet. This is an exciting role that will stretch your knowledge and curiosity, offering the opportunity to learn new skills.', '', 'Your duties will include: ', '\xa0• Researching, experimenting, prototyping and building models and components for content understanding pipelines, including state of art neural architectures for domain model selection, pre-training, fine-tuning, optimization, etc. ', '• Developing, transforming and reinforcing the quality datasets needed for specific natural language processing tasks \xa0', '• Identify opportunities to apply the latest advancements in NLP and Machine Learning to build, test, and validate models in named entity recognition, relation extraction, and entity linking ', '• Development of own deep learning architectures ', '• Deploy your algorithms as production services', '• Working closely with consumer teams to build solutions that deliver impactful projects', '', 'Qualifications:', '\xa0• Post-graduate or Ph.D. in Computer Science or Machine Learning related degree with a focus on NLP; \xa0', '• Experience with applying NLP models to live production systems ', '• Good theoretical grounding in core machine learning concepts and techniques ', '• Ability to perform comprehensive literature reviews and provide critical feedback on state-of-the-art solutions and how they may fit different operating constraints ', '• Experience with a number of ML techniques and frameworks, e.g., data discretization, normalization, sampling, linear regression, decision trees, SVMs, deep neural networks, etc. ', '• Experience with software engineering practices (e.g. unit testing, code reviews, design documentation) \xa0', '• Bachelors degree in data science, math, computer science, statistics or related field ', '• 2+ years of ML application and applied natural language processing ', '• Expert level programming skills Python ', '• Solid understanding of statistics and math behind deep learning ', '• Experience with data analysis tools ', '• English language native speaker: \xa0', '', 'Nice to have:', '• Publications in related domain ', '• Linux user experience ', '• Experience building machine learning models', '• Backend development experience', '• Strong interest in work involving data pipelines and/or large-scale data processing \xa0\xa0']

job_text: ['Develop a deep understanding of and appreciation for the weirdness of healthcare pricing in a highly inefficient marketApply your analytical skills to help reduce the cost of healthcare and make value-based care a realityDevelop creative methodologies to identify high-quality hospitals and physiciansActively participate in decision-making on what constitutes a high-quality providerDevelop and maintain reporting to drive Carrum’s provider price negotiations, including aggregating across multiple disparate internal and external benchmark data setsCollaborate closely with our Provider Business Development function throughout the sales and negotiating cycleStreamline how we report to our Centers of Excellence, including the development of self-service reportingSupport our Provider Operations and Relations departments with reporting and analyses to prepare for Joint Operating Committee meetings with and address inquiries from our Centers of Excellence', 'BS with 4+ years or MS with 2+ years of experience.\xa0 Degree(s) should be in a technical discipline such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Physics, Math, quantitative social science, or comparablePrevious Digital Health experience and dealing with healthcare dataStrong combination of analytical skills, intellectual curiosity and reporting acumenExcel/Google Sheets whiz; desire to converse in SQL is a strong plusExperience with various data analytics platforms, statistical analysis and visualization tools\xa0\xa0Microsoft Office is your friend but you prefer collaborating using Google toolsExcellent written and verbal communications, including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical collaboratorsProven track record in career growth and leadership opportunitiesExperience handling aggressive deadlines, keeping many balls in the air, and prioritizing work in a fast-paced, dynamic environmentA positive attitude and spirit of generosity to go above and beyond for our provider partners, our customers, and your internal colleaguesExperience with self-funded employer benefit plans, healthcare claims and quality data, and an understanding of healthcare bundled payment models are all serious plusesAn entrepreneurial spirit, creative problem solving, and innovative thinkingA natural self-starter who is comfortable working independently', 'We’re a hard-working, humble, and compassionate group motivated to make waves in healthcare.We’re solving one of today’s most complex problems and need sharp, creative minds like yours to help us achieve success.You can bring your authentic self to work every day and encourage others to do the same.\xa0We are a successful, fast-growing company at the forefront of the health and technology industries.\xa0We believe in using data to inform decisions, technology to make our jobs easier, and creative thinking to pave the future.We’ve partnered with some of the largest employers and top hospitals like Cleveland Clinic, Johns Hopkins, Mayo Clinic, Rush Health, and Scripps Health.We empower team members to be autonomous and provide a collaborative environment where you get support and healthy feedback.\xa0\xa0We carve out time to let go of work to celebrate our successes and have fun. Once the coronavirus has subsided, we cannot wait to resume monthly group dinners, bowling, and team outings at Filoli Gardens.You’ll feel proud that the work you do each day directly impacts thousands of people’s lives in very big ways.', 'Develop a deep understanding of and appreciation for the weirdness of healthcare pricing in a highly inefficient market', 'Apply your analytical skills to help reduce the cost of healthcare and make value-based care a reality', 'Develop creative methodologies to identify high-quality hospitals and physicians', 'Actively participate in decision-making on what constitutes a high-quality provider', 'Develop and maintain reporting to drive Carrum’s provider price negotiations, including aggregating across multiple disparate internal and external benchmark data sets', 'Collaborate closely with our Provider Business Development function throughout the sales and negotiating cycle', 'Streamline how we report to our Centers of Excellence, including the development of self-service reporting', 'Support our Provider Operations and Relations departments with reporting and analyses to prepare for Joint Operating Committee meetings with and address inquiries from our Centers of Excellence', 'BS with 4+ years or MS with 2+ years of experience.\xa0 Degree(s) should be in a technical discipline such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Physics, Math, quantitative social science, or comparable', 'Previous Digital Health experience and dealing with healthcare data', 'Strong combination of analytical skills, intellectual curiosity and reporting acumen', 'Excel/Google Sheets whiz; desire to converse in SQL is a strong plus', 'Experience with various data analytics platforms, statistical analysis and visualization tools\xa0\xa0', 'Microsoft Office is your friend but you prefer collaborating using Google tools', 'Excellent written and verbal communications, including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical collaborators', 'Proven track record in career growth and leadership opportunities', 'Experience handling aggressive deadlines, keeping many balls in the air, and prioritizing work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment', 'A positive attitude and spirit of generosity to go above and beyond for our provider partners, our customers, and your internal colleagues', 'Experience with self-funded employer benefit plans, healthcare claims and quality data, and an understanding of healthcare bundled payment models are all serious pluses', 'An entrepreneurial spirit, creative problem solving, and innovative thinking', 'A natural self-starter who is comfortable working independently', 'We’re a hard-working, humble, and compassionate group motivated to make waves in healthcare.', 'We’re solving one of today’s most complex problems and need sharp, creative minds like yours to help us achieve success.', 'You can bring your authentic self to work every day and encourage others to do the same.\xa0', 'We are a successful, fast-growing company at the forefront of the health and technology industries.\xa0', 'We believe in using data to inform decisions, technology to make our jobs easier, and creative thinking to pave the future.', 'We’ve partnered with some of the largest employers and top hospitals like Cleveland Clinic, Johns Hopkins, Mayo Clinic, Rush Health, and Scripps Health.', 'We empower team members to be autonomous and provide a collaborative environment where you get support and healthy feedback.\xa0\xa0', 'We carve out time to let go of work to celebrate our successes and have fun. Once the coronavirus has subsided, we cannot wait to resume monthly group dinners, bowling, and team outings at Filoli Gardens.', 'You’ll feel proud that the work you do each day directly impacts thousands of people’s lives in very big ways.', 'You’re excited about this opportunity because you will...', 'We’re excited about you because…', 'Why you’ll love working with us...', 'Other benefits include:\xa0', 'About Us', 'We’re rebuilding healthcare from the ground up, and the Provider Data Analyst will play a critical role in our success. We’ve experienced tremendous growth in the last few years. Now, we’re looking to bring on a professional who can take our provider quality evaluation and pricing processes to the next level of scale and performance. Our Centers of Excellence are at the core of our two-sided healthcare marketplace, and this team leads the charge.', '', 'You’ll work on healthcare cost and quality problems that are core to the company’s mission. You’ll focus on developing methodologies to identify the highest quality hospitals and physicians and analyze how much lower prices for common surgeries can be. You will help us find the next Mayo and Cleveland Clinic while making surgery there affordable. Once signed up, you will support our provider relationship with accurate reporting and analytical approaches to issue resolution. You will be part of the solution to the high healthcare costs in this country!\xa0\xa0', '', 'You’re excited about this opportunity because you will...', '\xa0', 'We’re excited about you because…', 'You’re a veteran of the digital health space with experience leading teams in a start-up environment that work directly with individuals to improve their health. Your track record speaks for itself, but you’re yearning for an opportunity to take your experience and apply it to a new role with enormous growth. We also hope to see from you:', '\xa0', '\xa0', 'Why you’ll love working with us...', '', 'Other benefits include:\xa0', 'Stock option plan', 'Regular all-company work from home days', 'Unlimited vacation days, within reason', 'Paid parental leave', 'Free, personalized lunches through EatClub 2x a week (once office reopens)', 'Health, vision, and dental insurance', '401K retirement plan', '', 'About Us', 'We’re a health tech company that brings value-based care to the masses. We help employers deliver a memorable patient experience, immediately lower healthcare costs, and drive better outcomes and achieve this through the power of technology and human-centered design. Since launching in 2014, we’ve partnered with Fortune 500 employers and top hospitals across the nation. We’ve been recognized by Harvard Business School and featured in TechCrunch, The Los Angeles Times, Washington Post, and Modern Healthcare. We believe we’re only scratching the surface on our opportunity and we’re looking for incredible people like you to help us realize our full impact.\xa0', '', 'Carrum Health is an equal opportunity employer and encourages all applicants from every background and life experience.', 'Develop a deep understanding of and appreciation for the weirdness of healthcare pricing in a highly inefficient market', 'Apply your analytical skills to help reduce the cost of healthcare and make value-based care a reality', 'Develop creative methodologies to identify high-quality hospitals and physicians', 'Actively participate in decision-making on what constitutes a high-quality provider', 'Develop and maintain reporting to drive Carrum’s provider price negotiations, including aggregating across multiple disparate internal and external benchmark data sets', 'Collaborate closely with our Provider Business Development function throughout the sales and negotiating cycle', 'Streamline how we report to our Centers of Excellence, including the development of self-service reporting', 'Support our Provider Operations and Relations departments with reporting and analyses to prepare for Joint Operating Committee meetings with and address inquiries from our Centers of Excellence', 'BS with 4+ years or MS with 2+ years of experience.\xa0 Degree(s) should be in a technical discipline such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Physics, Math, quantitative social science, or comparable', 'Previous Digital Health experience and dealing with healthcare data', 'Strong combination of analytical skills, intellectual curiosity and reporting acumen', 'Excel/Google Sheets whiz; desire to converse in SQL is a strong plus', 'Experience with various data analytics platforms, statistical analysis and visualization tools\xa0\xa0', 'Microsoft Office is your friend but you prefer collaborating using Google tools', 'Excellent written and verbal communications, including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical collaborators', 'Proven track record in career growth and leadership opportunities', 'Experience handling aggressive deadlines, keeping many balls in the air, and prioritizing work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment', 'A positive attitude and spirit of generosity to go above and beyond for our provider partners, our customers, and your internal colleagues', 'Experience with self-funded employer benefit plans, healthcare claims and quality data, and an understanding of healthcare bundled payment models are all serious pluses', 'An entrepreneurial spirit, creative problem solving, and innovative thinking', 'A natural self-starter who is comfortable working independently', 'We’re a hard-working, humble, and compassionate group motivated to make waves in healthcare.', 'We’re solving one of today’s most complex problems and need sharp, creative minds like yours to help us achieve success.', 'You can bring your authentic self to work every day and encourage others to do the same.\xa0', 'We are a successful, fast-growing company at the forefront of the health and technology industries.\xa0', 'We believe in using data to inform decisions, technology to make our jobs easier, and creative thinking to pave the future.', 'We’ve partnered with some of the largest employers and top hospitals like Cleveland Clinic, Johns Hopkins, Mayo Clinic, Rush Health, and Scripps Health.', 'We empower team members to be autonomous and provide a collaborative environment where you get support and healthy feedback.\xa0\xa0', 'We carve out time to let go of work to celebrate our successes and have fun. Once the coronavirus has subsided, we cannot wait to resume monthly group dinners, bowling, and team outings at Filoli Gardens.', 'You’ll feel proud that the work you do each day directly impacts thousands of people’s lives in very big ways.']

[' In the first few months, this position will be responsible for completing pull requests and data research. There is an outstanding list of data research and pull requests from internal and external customers. Getting those completed, and working with the rest of the Product Management team to create a process where those can be requested and satisfied more easily is the top priority. The primary data is stored in Amazon Redshift and the lab data is stored in Postgres instances. This role will be responsible for reporting, we would like to have the data appear in Tableau. Many of the ad-hoc requests will also have a reporting / presentation requirement. ', ' 3+ years of experience in Data Analysis. Experience with data integration, writing complex SQL queries and Python scripting. Experience creating dashboards/reports using Tableau. [' Must have a Masters in Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Physics, or a related field. Prefer (PhD) in above field(s).', ' Minimum of 4 years of experience in a hospital or clinic setting working with physicians and staff involved in patient care. Minimum of 4 years of experience working in the area of information systems and knowledge of standards, system configuration, decision support and information systems as well as all regulatory requirements of a medical institution. Must have experience in working with projects that resulted in the melding of multiple business cultures and significant organizational change related to the automation of clinical and administrative functions. Must have experience in conducting evaluations and assessments, i.e. change readiness assessments, workflow optimization assessments, etc. Must have experience in clinical system implementations throughout the project life-cycle, performing workflow analysis, testing, training, go-live support, system upgrades, and issues management.', ' May have an equivalent combination of education and experience to substitute for both the education and the experience requirements. May have experience as a principle investigator or in clinical research analytics capacity.', ' Must be recognized by peers as an outstanding conceptualizationist and solutions architect. Must have working knowledge of hospital organization and operations, administrative standards, regulations and practices. Must have working knowledge of Parkland and Medicine Services/Care Management organization and operations, administrative standards, regulations and practices within three months of job assignment. Must have expert level knowledge regarding EMR, word processing, database, and spreadsheet software. Must have strong analytic and computer skills in addition to an extensive knowledge of database management and data analysis. Must be fluent in advanced data programming language and statistical analysis software (be able to program in R, STATA, SPSS, or SAS statistical software). Must be able to demonstrate a working knowledge of program evaluation methods, statistical analysis, research skills, management information systems, and strategic planning. Must have strong written and verbal communication skills, have a high level of attention to detail, and have the ability to manage multiple projects at once. Must be a quick learner. job_title: Sr. Data Analyst - Finance, Innovation & Transformation
job_text: ['Establish reporting standards and best practices.Architect and implement a reporting framework. Oversee data mining efforts. job_title: Data Scientist II - RI Solutions & Innovations
job_text: ['Participate in requirement gathering, planning, technical design, and implementation for data science projectsProvide level of effort and schedule estimates to help with project planning Serve as project owner/manager for one or more data science projectsServe as a local expert in one or more technical areas related to data analyticsWork both independently and in small teams to develop data analytic solutionsMay mentor junior data scientists and may occasionally provide work direction and/or supervise staff such as subordinates, contractors, vendors, students, etc.Work with both clinical and research data while keeping PHI exposure to a need-only basisAdhere to and contribute to the development of best practices for statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, information retrieval, data mining, and big data management and analytics', 'Candidates must possess a PhD degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Clinical Informatics, Engineering or a related discipline, or a Master’s degree with 5+ years of experience1+ years of data manipulation and analysis experience using R, SAS, SQL, noSQL, Python or Java etc; more experience is a plus1+ years of data analytics experience in one or more of the following areas: statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and geospatial analytics; more experience is a plus', 'Typing on a keyboard Frequently (34-66%)Talking on phone/in person Occasionally (0-33%)Able to lift up to 50 lbs. Occasionally (0-33%)Standing/walking - Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Participate in requirement gathering, planning, technical design, and implementation for data science projects', 'Provide level of effort and schedule estimates to help with project planning', ' Serve as project owner/manager for one or more data science projects', 'Serve as a local expert in one or more technical areas related to data analytics', 'Work both independently and in small teams to develop data analytic solutions', 'May mentor junior data scientists and may occasionally provide work direction and/or supervise staff such as subordinates, contractors, vendors, students, etc.', 'Work with both clinical and research data while keeping PHI exposure to a need-only basis', 'Adhere to and contribute to the development of best practices for statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, information retrieval, data mining, and big data management and analytics', 'Candidates must possess a PhD degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Clinical Informatics, Engineering or a related discipline, or a Master’s degree with 5+ years of experience', '1+ years of data manipulation and analysis experience using R, SAS, SQL, noSQL, Python or Java etc; more experience is a plus', '1+ years of data analytics experience in one or more of the following areas: statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and geospatial analytics; more experience is a plus', 'Typing on a keyboard Frequently (34-66%)', 'Talking on phone/in person Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Able to lift up to 50 lbs. Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Standing/walking - Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Data Scientist II - RI Solution & Innovations', 'We are seeking a Data Scientist II -', 'We are seeking a Data Scientist II -', 'What Will You Be Doing?', 'What Are We Looking For?', 'To fulfill this role successfully, you must possess these minimum qualifications and experience:', 'Minimum Physical Requirements:', 'EOE/M/F/Disability/Vet', 'Data Scientist II - RI Solution & Innovations', '\xa0', 'We are seeking a Data Scientist II - The Data Scientist II is responsible for being a catalyst for evidence-based decision-making and a contributor to the advancement of NCH as a data-driven enterprise. Ideal candidates should enjoy flexing their data analytics muscles to solve intriguing clinical or research problems that may directly or indirectly impact clinical care and business operations at NCH. The Data Scientist will contribute to the implementation of a cohesive, powerful, and actionable long-term Data Science strategy involving the analysis of large complex healthcare data sets to discover hidden patterns, trends, and associations in support of research, operational, and clinical objectives. The Data Scientist will partner and consult with NCH stakeholders to identify opportunities to apply advanced analytic solutions, understand requirements, translate requirements to analytical problems, and provide effective data analytic solutions. The candidate should be able to leverage both structured and unstructured data sets to create analytical solutions using tools and/or methods in at least one of the following areas: statistical and predictive modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, and geospatial analysis.', '\xa0', 'What Will You Be Doing?', '', 'What Are We Looking For?', 'To fulfill this role successfully, you must possess these minimum qualifications and experience:', '', 'Minimum Physical Requirements:', '', 'EOE/M/F/Disability/Vet', 'Participate in requirement gathering, planning, technical design, and implementation for data science projects', 'Provide level of effort and schedule estimates to help with project planning', ' Serve as project owner/manager for one or more data science projects', 'Serve as a local expert in one or more technical areas related to data analytics', 'Work both independently and in small teams to develop data analytic solutions', 'May mentor junior data scientists and may occasionally provide work direction and/or supervise staff such as subordinates, contractors, vendors, students, etc.', 'Work with both clinical and research data while keeping PHI exposure to a need-only basis', 'Adhere to and contribute to the development of best practices for statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, information retrieval, data mining, and big data management and analytics', 'Candidates must possess a PhD degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Clinical Informatics, Engineering or a related discipline, or a Master’s degree with 5+ years of experience', '1+ years of data manipulation and analysis experience using R, SAS, SQL, noSQL, Python or Java etc; more experience is a plus', '1+ years of data analytics experience in one or more of the following areas: statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and geospatial analytics; more experience is a plus', 'Typing on a keyboard Frequently (34-66%)', 'Talking on phone/in person Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Able to lift up to 50 lbs. Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Standing/walking - Occasionally (0-33%)']

[' Participates in the development, validation and delivery of algorithms, statistical models and reporting tools.  Solves moderately complex analytical problems.  Develops, validates and executes algorithms and predictive models to investigate problems, detect patterns and recommend solutions. Explores, examines and interprets large volumes of data in various forms.  Performs analyses of structured and unstructured data to solve moderately complex business problems utilizing advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses.  Develops data structures and pipelines to organize, collect and standardize data that helps generate insights and addresses reporting needs.  Uses data visualization techniques to effectively communicate analytical results and support business decisions.  Creates and evaluates the data needs of assigned projects and assures the integrity of the data.  Documents projects including business objectives, data gathering and processing, detailed set of results and analytical metrics ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Statistics/Mathematics, Econometrics/Economics, Engineering/Computer Science, Business/Finance, or related quantitative field  Over 4 years of relevant programming or analytic experience.  Healthcare / Retail / Pharmacy experience  Ability to work with large data sets from multiple data sources.  Demonstrates proficiency in several areas of data modeling, machine learning algorithms, statistical analysis, data engineering and data visualization.  Effectively resolves problems and roadblocks as they occur.  Demonstrates good written and verbal communication skills.  Able to present information to various audiences  Excellent communication skills with strong background working directly with coworkers and clientele to identify business objectives and establish requirements  Worked in a team environment and also coordinated with business/functional team  Required Technical Skills R, Python, SAS, SQL, Advanced MS excel, Tableau  Knowledge of Hadoop framework encouraged What We Offer EXL Analytics offers an exciting, fast paced and innovative environment, which brings together a group of sharp and entrepreneurial professionals who are eager to influence business decisions. From your very first day, you get an opportunity to work closely with highly experienced, world class analytics consultants.  You can expect to learn many aspects of businesses that our clients engage in. You will also learn effective teamwork and time-management skills - key aspects for personal and professional growth  Analytics requires different skill sets at different levels within the organization. At EXL Analytics, we invest heavily in training you in all aspects of analytics as well as in leading analytical tools and techniques.  We provide guidance/ coaching to every employee through our mentoring program wherein every junior level employee is assigned a senior level professional as advisors.  Sky is the limit for our team members. The unique experiences gathered at EXL Analytics sets the stage for further growth and development in our company and beyond. ['', 'Qualified candidates will have the following:', "Bachelor's degree in mathematics or related field and 4-5 years of related experience or equivalent. -Solid experience with Tableau, statistical analysis and forecasting required. ", 'Solid experience with Tableau, statistical analysis and forecasting required.', '-The following are additional preferred criteria: SQL, MS Azure, Python, PowerBI, or other visualization software.', 'This is a direct-hire, not C2C or contract role. Candidates must be US citizens or Permanent Residents and able to permanently relocate to New Orleans in the near future.', 'SQL, MS Azure', 'SQL, MS Azure', 'This well-established company located in New Orleans is seeking to hire an experienced analyst with solid forecasting, statistical/mathematics and Tableau work experience.   The Planning/Forecast Analyst will have the following duties: ', '1. Responsible for completing the design day forecasts, normal volume requirements by month and daily forecast requirements by load study throughout the enterprise. 2. Responsible for comparing actual volumes to forecasted volumes to determine variance and further analyze variance by each component (ie resulting from weather difference, number of customers etc.) annually for peak/design day and monthly forecasts. 3. Responsible for modifying forecasts as necessary and communicating those revisions to appropriate personnel to be utilized in revising supply purchase and storage plans. 4. Provides each business division regulatory support including processing data requests preparing testimony and testifying before state commissions. 5. Evaluates transportation and storage capacity to ensure ability to meet peak days. 6. Evaluates and optimizes transportation portfolio considering alternative transportation options upstream pipeline capacity and market changes that could affect the portfolio. 7. Responsible for working with engineers and operations to evaluate local production opportunities. ', ' ', "Qualified candidates will have the following:  -Bachelor's degree in mathematics or related field and 4-5 years of related experience or equivalent. -Solid experience with Tableau, statistical analysis and forecasting required. ", '-The following are additional preferred criteria: SQL, MS Azure, Python, PowerBI, or other visualization software. ', 'This is a direct-hire, not C2C or contract role. Candidates must be US citizens or Permanent Residents and able to permanently relocate to New Orleans in the near future. ', '\xa0']

This platform supports global business units from many countries including USA, Japan, UK, Germany, Canada and others.', '', 'Role', 'We are looking for Big Data Java engineers. The position is located in San Mateo.', 'You will be responsible for leading design & development of Product Catalog & Search components including storage, search, large data processing (stream & batch), APIs, analytics, tools and web services.', 'This is a great opportunity to join early in the team and build/own the infrastructure. Duties and responsibilities may include, but are not limited to the following:', '\xa0', '', '1-5 years of solid\xa0Java back-end experience', 'Strong knowledge of design patterns, OOPS principles and data structures', 'Strong knowledge of at least some of the following frameworks/technologies – Hibernate, Spring, REST, XML, JSON, ActiveMQ,\xa0Kafka', 'Experience with any of these\xa0technologies a HUGE plus: Big\xa0Data (Cassandra / Hadoop), Spark, Beam, Kafka, Cloud (AWS or Google Cloud)', 'Experience with tools and technologies like Gradle, Maven, Jenkins, git, IntelliJ, Eclipse, Docker to support end to end software development', 'Experience with Relational databases, queries and RDBMS best practices as a consumer', 'Strong troubleshooting and performance tuning skills', 'Ability to work in a fast paced Agile development and rapid deployment in the Cloud/SaaS environment.', 'Project lead experience a plus', 'Able to effectively communicate across teams and roles.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science or a related field']

['I am working with an A.I. Telecom instituition looking for experienced professionals with strong client facing experience and exposure with big data such as Hadoop, Spark, Hive etc.', '', '', 'They are a consulting platform who are seeking someone who is comfortable consulting stakeholder/upper management and being responsible for technical decisions.', '', '', 'We have placed several individuals here in the last 3 months. The business focuses predominately on Scala, Python and experience with big data while being comfortable with customer facing experience.', '', '', 'They are looking for individuals that have worked in client facing environments and capable of advising management and assisting other data scientists who may have questions. Experience in the telecom industry would be great but it is not a dealbreaker. Alternatively, what would be highly advantageous is to have a MSc/PhD within Computer Science/Engineering or similarly related field.', '', '', 'Would this be of interest to you at this time? if so please apply and follow it up with a resume to j.perez@x4technology.us and I would be happy to explain the role better while learning about your work profile.', '', 'The entire process is being handled remotely which means the role will be filled quickly.']
